title: Youtube Video Editor
job_overview:
I’m looking for a reliable and creative long-form video editor to help me consistently turn my raw footage into engaging, binge-worthy YouTube videos that educate, inspire, and connect with my audience.

Content is fitness-focused, specifically calisthenics, and speaks directly to beginners, skinny guys, and people training at home. You’ll be taking my footage and direction and helping shape videos that deliver value while keeping people hooked from start to finish.

Must-Haves:
- Strong pacing, structure, and retention chops; you understand how to guide viewers from hook to payoff
- Experience with jump cuts, zooms, SFX, Upgrade to see actual info inserts, text overlays, b-roll integration, and pacing to music
- Ability to break long videos into chapters that keep viewers engaged (good flow + tension/release)
- Clean and dynamic captioning for key sections
- Creativity in storytelling, even from raw talking footage
